body_html:
So, the problem is that we need binary compatibility of existing graphs. So what you would need is,

  • Create a V2 op that has the new signature
  • Check it in, wait for 2 weeks
  • Change the python wrapper to call the new v2 op

Could you change the PR to create a new op? Thanks.

body:
So, the problem is that we need binary compatibility of existing graphs. So what you would need is,
* Create a V2 op that has the new signature
* Check it in, wait for 2 weeks
* Change the python wrapper to call the new v2 op

Could you change the PR to create a new op? Thanks.
